title: Shopify Theme Developer
excerpt: Currently engaged as a full-time Shopify Theme Developer for a US-based company. Responsibilities include comprehensive theme development, covering both backend configurations and frontend user interface implementation to deliver tailored e-commerce solutions.

title: Frontend Developer
excerpt: Worked as a Frontend Developer for a Singapore-based company, specializing in WordPress theme customization and the development of custom WordPress plugins. Delivered a wide array of frontend-focused projects, enhancing user experiences and site functionalities.
